content.rendered:
IOR/EOR Solutions

Logistics and Information Technology | Enhance Efficiency with TrueLog

  1. Home

Maximize your business's global trade potential with our expert Importer and Exporter of Record services.

TrueLog has been providing professional IOR/EOR services for IT equipment and technology hardware and goods in over 110 countries worldwide. Acting as your business’s international Importer of Record (IOR) or Exporter of Record (EOR), we enable you to import your technology hardware on a global scale, meeting all global trade and compliance requirements.

Streamlined Global Trade Compliance

In today’s complex international marketplace, navigating trade regulations is crucial for supply chain efficiency. Even large corporations with dedicated compliance teams can face unintentional violations, resulting in costly delays and penalties

TrueLog: Your Compliance Partner We specialize in:

Accurate product identification and valuation

Up-to-date customs clearance expertise

Comprehensive documentation management

Our Global Compliance Services

At TrueLog, we understand the dynamic challenges of international trade compliance for IT hardware. To help our clients navigate this complex landscape, we’ve streamlined the product classification process, ensuring smooth access to global markets.corper mattis, pulvinar dapibus leo.

Customs Compliance and Clearance

Ensure your goods meet all international trade compliance and legal requirements during the import process.

Compliance with Government Requirements

Navigate complex global import processes, ensuring smooth customs clearance and correct payment of duties and taxes.

Import Documentation Handling

Handle all necessary legal requirements, allowing your goods to clear customs and reach their final destination without unnecessary delays or financial penalties.

Logistics Coordination

Manage the efficient travel of your goods from the country of origin through the preparations of international import and export documents and customs procedures, including temporary imports and exports.s.

Consultation on Import Declaration

Provide expert advice on import declaration, helping you avoid complications and expenses.

Risk Management

Help you manage risks associated with international shipping of IT equipment, which is highly regulated and can involve complex processes.

Exporter of Record (EOR) Services

Our EOR Services Ensure

  • Smooth Customs Brokerage Handle all aspects of the export process, ensuring seamless export operations and full compliance with international trade regulations.
  • Delivered Duty Paid (DDP) Service Manage all customs clearance charges, duties, taxes, and levies pre-paid on your behalf.
  • Transportation to/from Key Regions Coordinate transportation of your goods to and from key regions around the world.
  • Labelling & Certification Compliance Ensure your goods meet all labelling and certification requirements for export.

meets the needs of every client

Benefits of Choosing TrueLog

  • Expertise in Global Logistics Benefit from our successful track record in international trade compliance over many years.
  • Own Warehouses Network Utilize our network of warehouses for efficient storage and distribution of goods.
  • Established and Experienced Teams Rely on our knowledgeable and experienced teams with expertise gained through many years of providing Importer and Exporter of Record services.
  • Local Expertise Leverage our ability to officially represent your business as the Importer or Exporter of Record in over 80 countries..
  • Transparent & Compliant Processes Trust our transparent and fully compliant processes aligned with international trade regulations.
  • Customized POD • : We provide your POD during deliveries, as if you are providing yourself

Our IOR and EOR Process Flow

Join numerous clients worldwide who have successfully leveraged our Importer and Exporter of Record solutions for IT equipment, technology hardware, and goods. Expand your business on a global scale with TrueLog while effortlessly meeting all trade and import compliance requirements.
